title: RISK The Game of Global Domination-ALiAS
description:
RISK The Game of Global Domination-ALiAS

Description:

Designed especially for desktop and tablet PC, the new, officially licensed version of RISK, the classic game of strategy and conquest. Features a beautifully rendered digital game board, animated dice, cards and armies that recreate the rivalry, competition and tension of the classic Hasbro board game. Play with up to 3 friends on or offline or challenge AI players in a solo game.


image

Features:

Battle up to 3 opponents made up of friends, AI or a mix of both
5 different levels of strategic AI Generals to choose from with differing play styles. Statistics for dice rolls are included to demonstrate AI fairness and randomness
Save and resume in-progress, local games
Online play available for players on your Steam friends list

image
